mapper.insert: insert into video(id, course_id, chapter_id, title, video_source_id, video_original_name, sort, play_count, is_free, duration, status, size, version, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{id}, #{courseId}, #{chapterId}, #{title}, #{videoSourceId}, #{videoOriginalName}, #{sort}, #{playCount}, #{isFree}, #{duration}, #{status}, #{size}, #{version}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified})
mapper.select: select id, course_id, chapter_id, title, video_source_id, video_original_name, sort, play_count, is_free, duration, status, size, version, gmt_create, gmt_modified from video where course_id = #{courseId}
select count(*) from video where chapter_id = #{chapterId}
